## Problem 1

First, load the "instacart" dataset.
```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart")

instacart_df = 
  instacart %>% 
  select(order_id, everything())
```


```{r}
instacart_df %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarise(n_obs = n())
```
